text: Saikat Nasir is a Bangladeshi Cinematographer, writer and director. He won the Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Cinematography for the film Desha: The Leader (2014). ==Selected films== * Desha: The Leader - (2014) * Hero 420 - (2016) * Pashan - (2018) * Casino - (2020) *Akbar - (2020) *Life - (2020) ==Awards and nominations== National Film Awards {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" ! Year !! Award !! Category !! Film !! title: Saikat Nasir
